about_the_game:
Your new wife and you have it all. A new home. A new marriage. Great careers.

Until your life is turned upside down.

After the death of your wife, Hisako Ito-Synclair, you and your sister Auriella travel to Hickens, CO, your hometown. The old stomping grounds.

Though, tragedy knows no bounds.

SANITY

SANITY is a first-person psychological horror game, inspired by the minds of David Lynch, Ari Aster, and Nicholas Roeg. Your story is directly affected by the choices and interactions with yourself and those around you. You play as Kaelon Synclair, who is on the path to discovering the truth about Hisako's death.

Along the way, you will experience childhood friends, family, and yes. More tragedy, but why? What have you done? What did Hisako do?

SANITY is a non-linear experience, and the way you interact with those around you directly influence the story laid before you.

Your in-game SANITY also affects the choices you are able to make and the way the world around you is perceived, as well as the ending you receive (this game is set to have multiple endings).

CHOICES DO MATTER
Your choices actually matter and influence the storyline, dialogue, and the way you are perceived by other characters in the story.

The choice is yours. Can you keep your sanity?

KEY FEATURES

- Full Body IK and advanced character locomotion
- 4K/8K Photorealistic Textures
- SANITY METER, that directly affects your experience. The only thing worse than being afraid is not knowing what you're afraid of.
- Full Subtitles (full dialogue coming soon)

*The game is now available for pre-alpha testing. If you would like to participate, contact us today!*

content_descriptors.notes: The mature content is readily available from game start. The game contains mature language and references, and a bit of cartoon violence, though not much. Little to no gore.
